name: Executive Officer
description:
This game is heavily in development, and likely contains multiple game breaking bugs! Progress is being made, and the game will be updated soon!

Executive Officer is a third person shooter title, wherein you take command of a capital ship, and battle your way through an unforgiving universe.

There are many things planned, including a procedurally generated galaxy, a short story to place you in the universe, missions to complete, and hopefully soon, you might even be able to save, and die! 

For now, feel free to download the title, and shoot at our AI ships as they careen through space. We'd love to hear feedback on controls and how the game feels!

If you'd like the AI to shoot back at you, there's a hidden key combination that unlocks that. It's the shortcut for reporting Caboose's team kills. 

Controls:

Mouse - Look around

WS - Acceleration

Space, C/AD/QE - Pitch, yaw, roll

` - Fire control (Hit again to deactivate)

Right click - Designate turret group to fire on target

Tab - Cycle turret groups

The only settings currently available are related to volume!
